oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1955-09-24 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 24, 1955. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Faron Young (host/performer - although Ernest Tubb was advertised as the host for this week on the previous show), guest performer Hawkshaw Hawkins, and regular performers Rod Brasfield with Uncle Cyp, Del Wood, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Uncle Cyp; Rod Brasfield; Hawkshaw Hawkins; Chet Atkins; Faron Young
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Comedy routine (Uncle Cyp, Faron Young, Rod Brasfield) [continued from part 1] -- Faron Young introduces Hawkshaw Hawkins -- I'll Take A Chance With You (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Faron Young introduces Chet Atkins -- Gay Ranchero (Chet Atkins) -- Faron Young talks -- All Right (Faron Young) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Faron Young) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Young, Faron; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Brasfield, Laurence Lemarr, 1898-1966; Hawkins, Hawkshaw, 1921-1963
